mapper.select: SELECT ct.id, ct.tx_index = 0 as is_cellbase, ct.witnesses, ct.header_deps, '0x' || encode(ct.tx_hash, 'hex') as tx_hash, ct.transaction_fee, ct.block_number, COALESCE(NULLIF(ltrim(encode(ct.version, 'hex'), '0'), ''), '0') AS version, ct.cycles, ct.bytes, acd.id as dep_id, '0x' || encode(acd.outpoint_tx_hash, 'hex') as outpoint_tx_hash, acd.outpoint_index, CASE WHEN acd.dep_type = 0 THEN 'code' WHEN acd.dep_type = 1 THEN 'dep_group' END AS dep_type /*, '0x' || encode(s.code_hash, 'hex') as code_hash, CASE WHEN s.hash_type = 0 THEN 'data' WHEN s.hash_type = 1 THEN 'type' WHEN s.hash_type = 2 THEN 'data1' WHEN s.hash_type = 4 THEN 'data2' ELSE null END AS hash_type*/ FROM ckb_transaction ct LEFT JOIN tx_association_cell_dep acd on ct.id = acd.tx_id WHERE ct.tx_hash = #{txHash} order by dep_id

SELECT ct.id, ct.tx_index = 0 as is_cellbase, '0x' || encode(ct.tx_hash, 'hex') as transaction_hash, ct.block_number, ct.block_timestamp, ct.display_inputs_count, ct.display_outputs_count FROM ckb_transaction ct WHERE ct.tx_hash IN ( SELECT tx_hash FROM output WHERE lock_script_id = #{addressScriptId} UNION SELECT consumed_tx_hash FROM output WHERE lock_script_id = #{addressScriptId} ) order by ${orderByStr} ${ascOrDesc}, tx_index desc
